instructions: Open the Photos app , then select a photo or video, or select multiple photos or videos. Tap the Share button , then tap Shared Albums. Add any comments you want, then tap Shared Albums. Choose an album to add the photo or video to.
Open the Calendar app , then add an event . While entering the event details, tap Calendar, then tap Family to add the event to the family calendar.

Go to Settings > [ your name ] > Family Sharing > Location Sharing, then turn on Share My Location. Tap Change My Location to This iPhone. Tap a family member you want to share your location with, tap Share My Location, then tap the Back button . You can repeat this step for each family member you want to share your location with. Each family member receives a message that you re sharing your location and can choose to share their location with you.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap Manage Subscription.
